name: Paisley Prince Neck Tie
description:
The varying textures giving life to this deep purple neck tie ooze elements of a true fashion extraordinaire.  The extravagance of this pattern paired with such a rich shade of purple forms the words to the statement the Affandina Man is clearly making. And the first word of that statement is regal.

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade 

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: King of Versailles Neck Tie
description:
If you plan to wear this neck tie when visiting the palace of King Louie the XIV and Marie Antoinette, make sure to inform the guards your attire is not part of the majestic décor. This yellow gold show  stopper will have everyone doing a double take every step you take! Try not to be too upset with how often admirers stare in fascination and longing to have the same one in their possession.

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade. 

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Ocean Nights Neck Tie
description:
Just because it is nighttime does not mean the sea sleeps. Vibrant with life rippling the blue waters, the beauty of that underwater splendor is captured by this breathtaking neck tie. This blue creation is such an attractive piece that it stuns its admirers into fits of awed curiosity. It is no wonder this piece flies, more like flows, off of our shelves. 

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade. 

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Orange Audacity Neck Tie
description:
Craftsmanship is underrated these days so it is up to the Affandina Man to change that. The excitement of orange fire ignites the passion to entertain those wishing they exuded the debonair attitude this neck tie demands. Remember when orange and gold were a bad thing? Neither do we.

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Smooth Operator Neck Tie
description:
This is no ordinary pink tie. This ebullient extravaganza of multiple styling and shading of pink creates a visual party that draws attention. Patterns that seem to move like the Affandina Man wearing it. This is not just a pink neck tie; it is THE pink neck tie.

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade. 

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Power Struggle Neck Tie
description:
Vying for dominance and admiration is no new process to the magnificent Affandina man; so why would his attire not reflect that as well. On the battlefield that is this neck tie, the chic nature of black wars the silk materials of the pink and silver streaks seeking the status of dominant color. In this battle, however, everyone wins…including the Affandina man sporting it.

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade. 

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Jade Grasshopper Neck Tie
description:
Green is widely known as the prime color of the world. This green neck tie, accompanied with blue stripes, will ensure that you are supreme in any environment that you enter.

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade.

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long 
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Stripes of Day Neck Tie
description:
Even though it uses the blues of the glorious cloudless day, this 100% silk neck tie can be worn in any weather. Shades of blue bring dimension to this striped creation that threatens to steal the sky’s its spotlight.  It is easy to use the colors of nature to decorate the force of nature that is the Affandina Man.

 This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade. 

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Orderly Fashion Neck Tie
description:
Rain drops on a sunny day envy this perfectly symmetrical neck tie. This golden yellow masterpiece is crafted so intricately as each square is accentuated with a sky blue drop. This neck tie makes you stand out while making others smile through their awed admiration.

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade. 

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Paradox Neck Tie
description:
Yes our red Polka Dots were so aligned so perfectly, snitched so expertly that we decided they needed their own dots. Tiny intricate white dots surround each red dot so nicely that the neck tie aligned itself so perfectly as though saying ‘Thank you for doting by dotting’.  We simply stood back and answered ‘Your Welcome’.

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: The Blues Neck Tie
description:
Only the smooth melodies of music can mimic the smooth lines of this beautiful pattern. The stitching of this deep blue silk keeps such a synchronized track that it simply sings as it brings together any outfit.

 This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade. 

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Crimson Night Neck Tie
description:
Whether it’s the holiday season or not, this beautifully crafted neck tie slices the night sky with streaks of crimson to look like a candy cane made for the naughty.  The sleek black neck tie was created to make a strong statement and the red stripes hugging it diagonally add the boldness an Affandina man is known to exude.

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade. 

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Lavish in Lilac Neck Tie
description:
Going past the standard polka dot pattern, diagonal rows of dotted splendor share the purple canvas in an attempt to bring dimension to its framework. Each dot brightens then plunges into dark depths acting as dozens of eyes searching the crowds of its Affandina Man’s admirers.  

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade. 

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Midnight Accents Neck Tie
description:
How do you make a spectrum look chic? Capture it and flaunt it as though light bends to your will? You pair this tie with your own personal ensemble and light up the faces of every admirer who is lucky enough to see the light. The colors zipping across this neck tie allow for multiple options for any handsome color palette. Can you see the light?

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade. 

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Autumn Thoughts Neck Tie
description:
This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long 
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Crème de le Crème Neck Tie
description:
The way this masterpiece of artistic expression lifts its crème canvas to a level of understated style and rebellion makes it the perfect accent to an outfit fit for a prince. How can someone say so much with a simple neck tie, easy, replace simple with Affandina.

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long 
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Mjolnir Neck Tie
description:
This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade.

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long 
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Red Wings Neck Tie
description:
A red neck tie says a great many things but this this silk material craftsmanship shows that the image is worth a thousand words. This neck tie turns heads with its red-hot, flaring dimensions so all the Affandina man has to do is let it soar. Fashion that will fly is fashion that will set you free.

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade.

 Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Ice Castles Neck Tie
description:
With this pattern of sheer beauty, it is clear we mean business at Affandina. This neck tie makes one imagine that this is what ice looks like up close. The playground of blues toys with the symmetry and beauty of the basics in nature. This is how you freeze time.

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade. 

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Perfect Day Neck Tie
description:
When plush green earth chases blue skies, nature gives us a perfect day. So we decided to pay homage to the beauty of nature shares with us. Now the Affandina Man can keep the circle of beauty (and Life) in full swing.

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade.

 Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Pink Whirlwind Neck Tie
description:
Pink 100% Silk. We said it. We made it. Then we blessed it with designs that gave it a life, a voice that speaks to everyone. Truth or dare? Is it true that this piece of art is sophisticated and beautiful enough to be better than simply daring? Definitely.

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade. 

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Ninja Warrior Neck Tie
description:
The stitching alone sets this neck tie apart from any silver and black tie you’ve ever seen before. 100% silk slices through the lines of conformity like the ninja weaponry it pays homage to. His artwork needs its own exhibit in the National Museum of Art. But it stands to have just as significant a display fitted around the Affandina Man lucky enough to be its guardian.

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade. 

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Ocean Breeze Neck Tie
description:
Nothing about this tie says that the man who wears it is one dimensional and plain. Like the bodies of water it reminds you of, this neck tie compliments the body of its personal Poseidon. The seas are at your command Affandina Man.

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Renaissance Man Neck Tie
description:
Sure you could choose to look at this Affandina masterpiece and just see ‘brown’, but that is surely hard to do. Everything about this neck tie says extraordinary. The detail is so all encompassing that it raises the shades of brown to an elite level of renaissance opulence. Welcome to a new age.

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade. 

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Tangerine Bliss Neck Tie
description:
Europe called, they want their exquisite design palette back. We told them that we were still using it. This new spin on classic architecture design with soft salmons, blues and yellows is clearly an certified Affandina show stopper!

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade.

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long 
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Black Knight Neck Tie
description:
Have you ever seen someone admire the flowers in the dark of night? You will with this neck tie. Nothing says sexy like a sleek black tie, except for maybe the masterpiece that is the Affandina Black tie. Designed to catch what light it can to accentuate the sophisticated pattern dictating the chic take on the classic.

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade. 

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Pastel Parade Neck Tie
description:
We are proud to introduce the Affandina man to this unique marriage of complexity and simplicity. Such a subtle play on pastel colors squares somehow livens an already striking platinum to produce a shimmering neck tie that perfectly masters the thin line between overstating and understating. This is a double-take piece that we ensure will keep the compliments flowing.

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade. 

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Feast of Fun Neck Tie
description:
Fun and stylish; it’s as simple as that. And that’s where the simplicity ends with this neck tie. This neck tie is destined to make the day that much better, lighter, freer. The 100% silk material elevates the print to a form of art much like the stained glass fixtures that remain a brilliant staple of European beauty.

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade. 

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Romeo Neck Tie
description:
Nothing says bold quite like the color red and this statement neck tie holds its own within the classic category it belongs to. A flawlessly stitched pattern of diagonal weaving resembles the basket filled with the hearts stolen by its Affandina Man owner.

This Affandina Tie is 100% Silk and handmade. 

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Royal Obsession Neck Tie
description:
The colors of royalty meet five different yet interwoven textures of 100% silk. This neck tie truly is a remarkable piece of art that commands that air of a certain something. You name it and this neck tie encompasses it so soundly that people will think times are changing and royalty is sauntering the streets freely. 

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade. 

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Unchained Neck Tie
description:
Unleashed on the world, we bring our take on how the Affandina Man is prisoner to the amazing world of high fashion. This 100% silk neck tie does not just tie one to success, it chains one to it. Only a black and white tie crafted as fine as this would be able to do the job!

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Picnic Neck Tie
description:
Woven strands of blue and yellow ensure a fashion trend begging to be seen. With the 100% silk catching the sun’s rays in all the right ways, this neck tie is certainly all purpose. Countless patterns are unconsciously derived to the admiring eye due to the masterful stitching and creative touches. 

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade.

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long 
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Flowers at Night Neck Tie
description:
Our pattern creations are respected by many and admired by all. So why would we exclude floral presentations from our repertoire? This deep dark blue neck tie is lightened by the floral design fit for the king with a green thumb.

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade. 

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Simple Showers Neck Tie
description:
Sun showers, night showers and can’t forget a little splash of fun showers depicted all in one 100% silk tie. Blues, golds and orange streams wrap around each other to bathe the Affandina Man in the colors of one of the most powerful forces of nature. Let this neck tie wash away the bland and rejuvenate the art of fashion.

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade.

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long 
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Jalapeno Neck Tie
description:
With the green circles in the middle of the square boxes it really is a unique rendition of Square Pegs and a Round Hole. We at Affandina take a great deal of time and care with each neck tie to give it that special edge that separates it from the norm. We love to think outside the box! 

This Affandina Tie is 100% silk and handmade.

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long 
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point

name: Freshwater Caviar Neck Tie
description:
Tiny dark ovals seemingly chaotic yet perfectly in sync with not only each other, but also with the trends of the elite. This light blue neck tie made  of 100% silk dares the Affandina man to uphold a stature of sophistication and modern elegance. Sometimes simple says more than the complex.

This Affadnina Tie is 100% silk and handmade

Size: 
"61" (155cm) long
"3¾" (9.5cm) at widest point
